ComicInfo.Summary:
The adventure continues and the mystery deepens as Sonja and Tarzan must save the Greystoke family from extreme peril and try to rectify the disturbances in time caused by the evil Elon Duul!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Aaron Lopresti | 1 | | B | Cover B | Walter Geovani & Dee Cunniffe | 2 | | C | Cover C | Sergio Davila & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | | D/Sub | Subscription Cover D | Roberto Castro & Salvatore Aiala | 4 | | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Walter Geovani | 5 | | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Sergio Davila | 6 | | G/RI | 1:30 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Aaron Lopresti | 7 |
